info.title: TLCarrier
info.description: ODI Enterprise Service providing query & update endpoints for TLCarrier & child entities

get.description: Returns all TL Carrier Certification Type rows
Returns top 100 TLCarrier & TLCarrierAddress 'partial' entities based on params, to narrow down or improve results carrierNM needs to be more refined

parameters.name: carrierNM
parameters.description: Query based on carrierNM, allows partial name using query with 'like', must be at least 2 bytes

parameters.name: addrType
parameters.description: Query based on address type name from GEN.Address_Type

400.description: 400 Bad Request - returned if carrierNM isn't over 1 byte

get.description: Return all or partial TLCarrier entities based on params

parameters.name: addrType
parameters.description: Query based on address type name from GEN.Address_Type

parameters.name: full
parameters.description: Set to true to return ALL child entities, false to return TL_Carrier & TL_Carrier_Address
